caption.p: X5CrNiCuNb16-4 ( a) Selected DSC cooling curves of X5CrNiCuNb16-4 after austenitisation at 1100 째C, 30 min. The DSC peaks between about 1000 째C and 600 째C indicate the quench-induced precipitation of Cu-rich particles, while the strong peak below about 200 째C corresponds to the martensitic transformation. ( b) Hardness as a function of the cooling rate in the quenched and in the quenched and aged conditions, adapted from [ 122].
